answerText: South Sudan[10] The violence from the coup attempt was mostly localized in this capital city of South Sudan, located on the Nile River.
heading: ACF Regionals 2014 |2014 | Penn A-Northmont-Chicago B | 16 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question:  [10] That coup attempt occurred in this African country, which gained autonomy in 2011. This nation's northern counterpart has its capital at Khartoum.
